locations.name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
locations.description: Over 400 bird species across savannah and riverine forests. Excellent year-round birding with migration peaks.

locations.name: Lake Nakuru National Park
locations.description: Iconic flamingo flocks and over 450 species supported by wetlands and woodlands.

locations.name: Amboseli National Park
locations.description: Over 600 species set against Mount Kilimanjaro, with wetlands attracting resident and migratory birds.
